Class PlayerActions

java.lang.Object
dev.gruncan.spotify.webapi.objects.player.PlayerActions
All Implemented Interfaces:
SpotifyObject, Serializable
public class PlayerActions extends Object implements SpotifyObject
Represents the action available within the current context
